// Pivot 0, 0
int Bumper2mirrored[24] = {
	0, 19,
	0, 26,
	2, 29,
	4, 29,
	7, 27,
	10, 18,
	13, 9,
	13, 1,
	11, 0,
	9, 0,
	6, 1,
	4, 8
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Bumper2mirrored[24] = {
	0.000000f, 0.296875f,
	0.000000f, 0.406250f,
